title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 332.1 - Not required to register personally
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 332.1 - Not required to register personally

State Regulations
A military voter shall not be required to register
personally. An application for a military ballot shall constitute permanent
personal registration whenever such registration is required. Such military
voter shall be deemed registered under the rules and regulations prevailing
under permanent personal registration and upon the filing of his application
and the entering of his or her name in the appropriate register or on the
registration records. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
332.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
